shortcv.p: Marios Fragkoulis is a PhD Candidate at the Athens University of Economics and Business (AUEB), Department of Management Science and Technology. He holds a BSc in Management Science and Technology from Athens University of Economics and Business with distinction and a MSc in Computing Science from Imperial College London with distinction.

He is a member of the EuroSys society and the SENSE group. His research interests include data structure representations and data extraction through higher-level interfaces as well as Software Engineering.
He was funded by Foundation Propondis.
